DOC.brief_title: Effect Qigong Balance , Fall Efficacy , Wellbeing People With Stroke Hong Kong
DOC.detailed_description: Participants : A total 58 stroke survivor 3 month current stroke recruit . Methodology : An assessor-blinded , randomize control trial conduct . Stroke survivor include study meet inclusion criterion . Selected patient randomly allocate either experimental group control group . Participants allocate experimental group receive qigong training qigong training replace home fitness exercise control group . The experimental control group require practice total 50 minute qigong fitness training 3 time per week 16 week respectively . The main outcome measure balance capacity Mini-BESTest . The secondary outcome fall efficacy , number fall , postural stability control , depression , physical function quality life . Assessments do baseline , 8 week 16 week follow-ups blind assessor . Data analysis : The result analyze use two-way repeat measure analysis variance Statistical Package Social Science version 21.0 . Alpha set 0.05 .
